targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "response_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "fast")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Fast Mode")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "response_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "agency")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Agency Mode")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "response_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mode"] == "reflective")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Reflective Mode")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "response_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 1000.0 }))
  |> mean()
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "message_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "duration_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Memory")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "knowledge_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "duration_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Knowledge")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trust_update")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "trust_score")
  |> group(columns: ["user_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "trust_score")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tool_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "success")
  |> group(columns: ["tool_name"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "complexity_classification")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "message_length")
  |> group(columns: ["predicted"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "complexity_classification")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "classification_time_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "reaction_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "message_length")
  |> group(columns: ["reaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count")

import "array"

successData = from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tool_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "success")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == true)
  |> count()
  |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "_value")

totalData = from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tool_usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "success")
  |> count()
  |> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "_value")

s_val = if length(arr: successData) > 0 then successData[0] else 0
t_val = if length(arr: totalData) > 0 then totalData[0] else 0

successRate = if t_val == 0 then 0.0 else float(v: s_val) / float(v: t_val) * 100.0

array.from(rows: [{_value: successRate}])

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "complexity_classification")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "intent_count")
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "universe_event_published")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> group(columns: ["event_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

panels.title: Cross-Bot Events Published
panels.description: Requires ENABLE_UNIVERSE_EVENTS=true. Events shared between bots for cross-bot awareness.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trace_reused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "quality_score")
  |> group(columns: ["complexity"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count")

panels.title: Reasoning Trace Reuse
panels.description: Requires ENABLE_TRACE_LEARNING=true. Shows how often the system reuses previous reasoning patterns.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trace_reused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "quality_score")
  |> mean()
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Avg Trace Quality Score
panels.description: Requires ENABLE_TRACE_LEARNING=true. Quality score of reused reasoning traces (0-1).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "trace_reused")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "similarity_score")
  |> mean()
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Avg Trace Similarity Score
panels.description: Requires ENABLE_TRACE_LEARNING=true. How well matched traces are to current queries (0-1).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "universe_event_blocked")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "sum")

panels.title: Blocked Universe Events
panels.description: Requires ENABLE_UNIVERSE_EVENTS=true. Events blocked due to privacy rules or rate limits.
Character consistency over time. Green (<0.2) = stable, Yellow (0.2-0.4) = minor drift, Red (>0.4) = significant drift. From E16 Feedback Loop Stability.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "personality_drift")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "drift_score")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bot_name"] =~ /${bot_name:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Personality Drift")

panels.title: Personality Drift (E16)

panels.description: Knowledge graph growth from E25 Graph Enrichment Agent. Shows edges created between users, topics, and entities.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "graph_enrichment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "user_topic_edges")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "User-Topic")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "graph_enrichment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "user_user_edges")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "User-User")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "graph_enrichment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "topic_topic_edges")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Topic-Topic")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "graph_enrichment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "entity_entity_edges")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Entity-Entity")

panels.title: Graph Enrichment (E25)

panels.description: Message volume by channel type (DM vs Guild). Useful for understanding usage patterns.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "message_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel_type"] == "dm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bot_name"] =~ /${bot_name:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "DM")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "message_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["channel_type"] == "guild")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bot_name"] =~ /${bot_name:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Guild")

panels.title: Message Volume by Channel Type

panels.description: Average message length over time. Longer messages may indicate deeper engagement.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "message_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["bot_name"] =~ /${bot_name:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Avg Message Length")

panels.title: Average Message Length

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "complexity_classification")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /intent_behavior_.*/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "safety_audit")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "bot_name", "user_id", "is_safe", "reason"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "metrics",
  tag: "bot_name",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -7d
)
list.label: Bot
list.name: bot_name
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "metrics",
  tag: "bot_name",
  predicate: (r) => true,
  start: -7d
)
